summary: Implemented Phases 1-3 of augmented extension seed approach. Removed broken forward_F/backward_P structural fields, simplified extensionSeed to GContent+HContent only. Build succeeds with 8 sorries (structural changes complete, but some proofs need finishing).

artifacts.summary: Detailed summary of changes made, remaining sorries, and recommendations

completion_data.completion_summary: Removed mathematically unsatisfiable forward_F/backward_P fields from GHCoherentPartialFamily structure and simplified extensionSeed to GContent+HContent only. 4 extension sorries eliminated, but 2 new sorries added for F/P satisfaction proofs. Build passes with 8 sorries total.
